channel.title: 🏢 INESC-ID on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 INESC-ID on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: NeuralSolver: Learning Algorithms For Consistent and Efficient Extrapolation Across General Tasks
item.description: NeuralSolver: A novel recurrent solver efficiently and consistently extrapolates algorithms from smaller problems to larger ones, handling various problem sizes.
